entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
